welcome.title: Welcome to Tickd!
welcome.description:
Welcome to a simpler life with Tickd.
Simply add tasks with the 'Add a task' box at the top, and use keywords such as 'today' and 'tomorrow' in the date, or for other dates simply add the date using the DD/MM/YY format.
e.g. for the 31st December 2025, you would put 31/12/25.
